scripts.patch-version: npm run process-commits && npm version patch
scripts.save-log: rm ./change_log/commits.txt && mkdir ./change_log/$npm_package_version/ && mv ./change_log/change_log.md  ./change_log/$npm_package_version/change_log.md && git add ./change_log/$npm_package_version/change_log.md && git commit --amend --no-edit
